IntroSong.Verse: I should have known I'd leave alone Just goes to show That the blood you bleed is just the blood you owe We were a pair But I saw you there Too much to bear You were my life, but life is far away from fair Was I stupid to love you? Was I reckless to help? Was it obvious to everybody else?
IntroSong.Chorus: That I'd fallen for a lie You were never on my side Fool me once, fool me twice Are you death or paradise? Now you'll never see me cry There's just no time to die
IntroSong.Verse: I let it burn You're no longer my concern, mmm Faces from my past return Another lesson yet to learn
IntroSong.Chorus: That I'd fallen for a lie You were never on my side Fool me once, fool me twice Are you death or paradise? Now you'll never see me cry There's just no time to die
IntroSong.Verse: No time to die, mmm No time to die, ooh
Fool me once, fool me twice Are you death or paradise? Now you'll never see me cry There's just no time to die
